dataset_info.title: FinTech Early Warning Dataset for Sub-Saharan Africa
dataset_info.description: Comprehensive dataset for FinTech distress prediction research

company_identifiers.company_id: Unique identifier for each FinTech company
company_identifiers.country: Sub-Saharan African country where company operates

temporal_variables.quarters_since_founding: Number of quarters since company founding

financial_metrics.quarterly_costs: Total operational costs for the quarter (USD)

operational_metrics.active_users: Number of active users in the quarter
operational_metrics.customer_acquisition_cost: Cost to acquire a new customer (USD)
operational_metrics.number_of_agents: Number of agents/partners (for relevant FinTech types)

funding_metrics.funding_round: Whether company raised funding this quarter (Boolean)
funding_metrics.funding_stage: Stage of funding round (Pre-Seed, Seed, Series A, etc.)

distress_indicators.is_distressed: Whether company is currently in distress (Boolean) - DEPENDENT VARIABLE
distress_indicators.distress_type: Type of distress (closure, acquisition, regulatory_action, severe_downturn)
